sections.heading: This Act shall be known and may be cited as the "Dental Student Grant Act".
sections.text: This Act shall be known and may be cited as the "Dental Student Grant Act".

sections.heading: The purpose of this Act is to establish a program in the Illinois
sections.text:
Department of Public Health to encourage minority students to enroll in
and complete dental school in the State of Illinois.

sections.heading: The terms specified in Sections 3.01 through 3.07 have the
sections.text:
meanings ascribed to them in those Sections unless the context of this Act
otherwise requires.

sections.heading: "Department" means the Illinois Department of Public Health.
sections.text: "Department" means the Illinois Department of Public Health.

sections.heading: "Director" means the Director of Public Health.
sections.text: "Director" means the Director of Public Health.

sections.heading: "Dentist" means a person licensed to practice dentistry under
sections.text:
the Illinois Dental Practice Act. For the purposes of this Act, "dentist"
does not include persons licensed as specialists.

sections.heading: "Eligible dental student" means a person who meets all of the
"Racial minority" means a person who is any of the following:
sections.text: "Racial minority" means a person who is any of the following:

sections.heading: The Department shall have the powers and duties specified in Sections
To award grants to eligible dental students.
sections.text: To award grants to eligible dental students.

sections.heading: To establish a program of dental student grants and to make
To determine criteria and standards of financial need for making
To determine the procedures for the distribution of grants
sections.text: to dental students in accordance with the following guidelines:

sections.heading: To promulgate rules and regulations which are necessary for
sections.text: the establishment and maintenance of the programs required by this Act.
